accuracy.description: The percent value of how likely this move is to be successful.

effect_chance.description: The percent value of how likely it is this moves effect will take effect.

power.description: The base power of this move with a value of 0 if it does not have a base power.

pp.description: Power points. The number of times this move can be used.

effect_entries.description: The effect of this move listed in different languages.

type.description: The elemental type of this move.

version_group.description: The version group in which these move stat values were in effect.
